helpDescription: Change settings for where the announcements are sent.
helpUsage: Set where announcement messages are sent.```/type set <default/dm//off/rewards>```
Direct announcements messages to a specific channel.```/type channel <channel>```
successChannel: Announcements channel has been set to **%s**.`
successDefault: Announcements will now appear in the **channel the user levels up in**.
successReward: Announcements will only be sent on levels which **reward** members.
